    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseMapper

        public DatabaseMapper(DoerDB doerDB)
               throws java.sql.SQLException,
                      InitializationFailureException
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        doerDB - DoerDB The DoerDB instance for which the Mapper should be created.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If any exception is thrown during the execution of MySQL queries internally.
        InitializationFailureException - If any exception is thrown during the initialization of DoerDatabases.

      • getTableMapperByLocalTable

        public TableMapper getTableMapperByLocalTable(java.lang.String localTableName)

        Parameters:

      • getTableMapperByRemoteTable

        public TableMapper getTableMapperByRemoteTable(java.lang.String remoteTableName)
        Used to obtain the Table Mapper related to the provided table name in the remote database.
        Parameters:
        remoteTableName - String The name of the remote table.
        Returns:
        TableMapper Instance.

      • setTableMapper

        public boolean setTableMapper(TableMapper tableMapper)
        Sets a TableMapper for DatabaseMapper. Searches for either of local/remote table name in the given TableMapper in the list of TableMappers in the current DatabaseMapper and sets it.
        Parameters:
        tableMapper - TableMapper The TableMapper instance to be set.
        Returns:
        boolean true if successful, false otherwise(when either of the table names cannot be found in the database)
